name: Along The River
description:
You are a young frog tasked with stopping waste that is flowing down the river. Pick your personality cards and head upstream. Talk with other creatures and try to recruit them to your cause.

Controls:

  • Use the mouse to click and drag cards 
  • Drop cards into the highlighted areas to play them or add them to your collection.

Credits:

  • Programming: JeffCube
  • 2D/3D Art: [Fish]
  • Story: Brassica
  • Sound Design: Daniel SoundsGood

This was a game made for Narrative Driven Jam #7
